'''Myriad of Lights''' is a soundtrack from the EP album ''[[Fleeting Colors in Flight (Album)|Fleeting Colors in Flight]]''.

The soundtrack was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Event Quest]] [[Fleeting Colors in Flight]]: Part III - "[[The Stars Inscribe the Year's Wishes]]."

==Trivia==
* <section begin="MyriadOfLightsLeitmotif" />The following soundtracks share a leitmotif:
** [[Myriad of Lights]]
** [[Fleeting Colors in Flight (Soundtrack)|Fleeting Colors in Flight]]<section end="MyriadOfLightsLeitmotif" />
* {{Transclude|Liyue (Soundtrack)|LanternRiteLeitmotif|section=1}}
* The musical theme of ''Fleeting Colors in Flight'' was taken from the opening of Shanghai's 2019 city image film "{{zh|上海·恒新之城}}" ("Shanghai·Ever-Renewing City"). The film soundtrack was composed by Yu-Peng Chen.<ref>Weibo: [https://weibo.com/2539961154/Ia2tn0FQS {{zh|【上海·恒新之城！全新进博会城市形象片震撼发布】}}]</ref>
* This soundtrack features multiple themes:
** [[Liyue (Soundtrack)|Liyue]] (second theme)
** [[Genshin Impact Main Theme]]
** [[Moon in One's Cup]]/[[Maiden's Longing]]/[[Clear Sky Over Liyue]]
** [[Peaceful Hike (Qingce Daytime)|Peaceful Hike]]/[[The Fading Stories (Qingce Night)|The Fading Stories]]
